# BLES00901.ps3savepatch

### 1. Max carry weight

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
80010004 7CAF100D
93000000 00000014
88000004 0000803F
93000000 000002C8
28000000 80E57349
```

### 2. Max ap

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
80010004 7CAF100D
93000000 00000014
88000004 0000803F
93000000 000002CD
28000000 804fc347
```

### 3. Max limb health

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
80010004 7caf100d
93000000 00000014
88000004 0000803F
93000000 0000028c
28000000 0000fa43
28000005 0000fa43
2800000a 0000fa43
2800000f 0000fa43
28000014 0000fa43
28000019 0000fa43
```

### 4. Extra Rad resist

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```

93000000 00000014
88000004 0000803F
93000000 000002a5
28000004 00004743
```

### 5. Rapid reload

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
28000000 0000FA43
```

### 6. XXXXXXXX is the first four letters of your name
### 7. Max Special based on your character's name

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
80020004 XXXXXXXX
93000000 0000000B
28000000 0A0A0A0A
28000004 0A0A0A7C
```
